Handlers¶

Initialization¶

stage.py - Stage Simulation Initialization Handler¶

Create config files for Stage and start it up (as part of a player server) in a subprocess

class handlers.init.stage.initHandler(proj, calib=False)¶
getSharedData()¶
Returns nothing
writeSimConfig(proj, calib)¶
Generates .world and .cfg files for Stage.

playerclient.py - Player Client Initialization Handler¶

Creates a player client, connects to a specified player server, and instantiates a Position2D proxy object

Returns the player client object and Position2D proxy object

class handlers.init.playerclient.initHandler(proj, calib=False)¶
getSharedData()¶
Return the Player Client object to be used by handlers further down the line

Sensor¶

dummySensor.py - Dummy Sensor Handler¶

Displays a silly little window for faking sensor values by clicking on buttons.

class handlers.sensor.dummySensor.sensorHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
getSensorValue(sensor_name)¶

Return a boolean value corresponding to the state of the sensor with name sensor_name

If such a sensor does not exist, returns None

sensorListen()¶
Processes messages from the sensor handler subwindow, and updates our cache appropriately

Actuator¶

dummyActuator.py - Dummy Actuator Handler¶

Does nothing more than print the actuator name and state; for testing purposes.

class handlers.actuator.dummyActuator.actuatorHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
setActuator(name, val)¶
Pretends to set actuator of name name to be in state val (binary).

Locomotion Command¶

playerLocomotionCommand.py - Player Pos2D Client¶

Sends velocity commands to player

class handlers.locomotionCommand.playerLocomotionCommand.locomotionCommandHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
sendCommand(cmd)¶
Send command to player. Arguments depend on robot model.

orcaLocomotionCommand.py - Orca Velocity Handler¶

Sends Vt, Vw velocity commands to Orca

class handlers.locomotionCommand.orcaLocomotionCommand.locomotionCommandHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
sendCommand(cmd)¶

Send a command to the Orca Velocy server.

Expects [Vt, Vw].

Pose¶

stagePose.py - 2D Pose Client for Stage¶

Reads from Stage’s simulated GPS

Prerequisites:
  • Player Client Initialization Handler
  • Stage Initialization Handler
class handlers.pose.stagePose.poseHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
getPose()¶
Returns the most recent (x,y,theta) reading from Stage’s GPS

orcaPose.py - Orca Pose Client¶

Reads Vicon pose data via Orca

class handlers.pose.orcaPose.poseHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
getPose()¶
Gets the most recent pose reading from the multicast stream.

Drive¶

differentialDrive.py - Differential Drive Handler¶

Converts a desired global velocity vector into translational and rotational rates for a differential-drive robot, using feedback linearization.

class handlers.drive.differentialDrive.driveHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
setVelocity(x, y, w=0)¶

holonomicDrive.py - Ideal Holonomic Point Drive Handler¶

Passes velocity requests directly through. Used for ideal holonomic point robots.

class handlers.drive.holonomicDrive.driveHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
setVelocity(x, y, w=0)¶

Motion Control¶

heatController.py - Potential Field Region-to-Region Motion Control¶

Uses the heat-controller to take a current position, current region, and destination region and return a global velocity vector that will help us get there

class handlers.motionControl.heatController.motionControlHandler(proj, shared_data)¶
get_controller(current, next, last, cache={})¶
Wrapper for the controller factory, with caching.
gotoRegion(current_reg, next_reg, last=False)¶

If last is true, we will move to the center of the region.

Returns True if we are outside the supposed current_reg
